item.title: Trump and Europe’s Far Right
item.description: The American national security strategy echoes the language of far-right parties. But hardliners across the Atlantic seem unimpressed.

item.title: Israeli Ban on Media Entering Gaza Remains, as Legal Challenge Is Delayed
item.description: Israel’s top court gave the government further reprieve on a long-stalled petition seeking free access to Gaza. Critics say barring journalists denies...

item.title: Brigitte Macron’s Slur Against Feminist Protesters Prompts an Outcry in France
item.description: Brigitte Macron used a slur to criticize protesters who had interrupted a show by a French comedian accused of rape in 2021, in a case that was dismis...

item.title: Australia’s Social Media Ban for People Under 16 Takes Effect
item.description: The measure is one of the most sweeping efforts in the world to safeguard children from the harms of the platforms.
